original_title: Yank My Doodle, It's a Dandy!
overview: The rough and tough Roscoe puts everything on the line to win the big pool tournament, including his "Yankee Doodle" Salon.  He has a really good chance of pulling it off, too, if he could just keep his mind on the game... and not the dames.  His equally cantankerous enemy schemes to distract him by introducing Roscoe to the blonde bombshell Carla.
title: Yank My Doodle, It's a Dandy!
